mapper.select: SELECT d.dog_name,d.dog_photo,de.designer_name,i.item_name,i.item_price,re.resv_no,re.resv_fix,DATE_FORMAT(sc.sc_date, CONCAT('%y','.','%m','.','%d',' | ','%H','시')) sc_date FROM resv re INNER JOIN dog d ON re.dog_id=d.dog_id INNER JOIN item i ON re.item_id=i.item_id INNER JOIN designer de ON re.designer_id=de.designer_id INNER JOIN schedule sc ON re.resv_no=sc.resv_no WHERE re.useremail=#{useremail} ORDER BY re.resv_no desc

SELECT d.dog_name,d.dog_photo,de.designer_name,i.item_name,i.item_price,re.resv_no,re.resv_fix,re.cancel FROM resv re INNER JOIN dog d ON re.dog_id=d.dog_id INNER JOIN item i ON re.item_id=i.item_id INNER JOIN designer de ON re.designer_id=de.designer_id WHERE re.useremail=#{useremail} AND re.resv_fix=2

SELECT d.dog_name,d.dog_photo,de.designer_name,i.item_name,i.item_price,re.resv_no,DATE_FORMAT(sc.sc_date, CONCAT('%Y','년 ','%m','월 ','%d','일')) sc_date FROM resv re INNER JOIN dog d ON re.dog_id=d.dog_id INNER JOIN item i ON re.item_id=i.item_id INNER JOIN designer de ON re.designer_id=de.designer_id INNER JOIN schedule sc ON re.resv_no=sc.resv_no WHERE re.useremail=#{useremail} AND re.resv_fix=1 ORDER BY sc.sc_date desc
mapper.update: UPDATE resv SET dog_id=#{dog_id}, designer_id=#{designer_id}, item_id=#{item_id}, resv_ask=#{resv_ask} WHERE resv_no=#{resv_no}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(res.resv_fix) resvcnt FROM resv res INNER JOIN user us ON us.useremail = res.useremail WHERE res.resv_fix = 1 and us.useremail=#{useremail}

select resv.resv_no, DATE_FORMAT(sc.sc_date, "%Y년%m월%d일") sc_date, d.dog_name, de.designer_name from resv resv INNER JOIN dog d ON d.dog_id = resv.dog_id INNER JOIN designer de ON de.designer_id = resv.designer_id INNER JOIN schedule sc ON sc.resv_no = resv.resv_no LEFT OUTER JOIN review re ON resv.resv_no = re.resv_no where resv_fix=1 and re.resv_no is null and resv.useremail=#{useremail}

SELECT d.dog_name,d.dog_photo,de.designer_name,i.item_name,i.item_price,re.resv_no,rev.review_no,DATE_FORMAT(sc.sc_date, CONCAT('%Y','년 ','%m','월 ','%d','일')) sc_date FROM resv re INNER JOIN dog d ON re.dog_id=d.dog_id INNER JOIN item i ON re.item_id=i.item_id INNER JOIN review rev ON rev.resv_no= re.resv_no INNER JOIN designer de ON re.designer_id=de.designer_id INNER JOIN schedule sc ON re.resv_no=sc.resv_no WHERE re.useremail=#{useremail} AND re.resv_fix=1 ORDER BY sc.sc_date desc

select d.dog_name, d.dog_photo, de.designer_name, i.item_name, resv.resv_no, DATE_FORMAT(sc.sc_date, CONCAT('%Y','년 ','%m','월 ','%d','일')) sc_date from resv resv INNER JOIN dog d ON d.dog_id = resv.dog_id INNER JOIN item i ON resv.item_id=i.item_id INNER JOIN designer de ON de.designer_id = resv.designer_id INNER JOIN schedule sc ON sc.resv_no = resv.resv_no LEFT OUTER JOIN review re ON resv.resv_no = re.resv_no where resv_fix=1 and re.resv_no is null and resv.useremail=#{useremail} and NOW() > sc.sc_date ORDER BY sc.sc_date desc
SELECT res.item_id, i.item_name, i.item_photo, COUNT(*) AS cnt FROM resv res INNER JOIN item i ON res.item_id = i.item_id GROUP BY item_id ORDER BY cnt desc LIMIT 3
